verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: asked] [ARG2: the oldest people i know] [ARG1: what they regret most] and their replies contradicted what people tend to think is important in life no matter how old people get everyone has joys hopes fears and longings that never go away what makes us happy can change as we age regrets most often revolve around relationships with family and friends rather than careers and success many elderly say their happiest moments were mid - life life oldest people
